ModMetaData.name: Universal Pregnancy
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
<size=18px><color=#5aa9d6>Description</color></size> Removes gender requirements from everything related to reproduction, including IVF. Same-sex couples as well as opposite-sex couples can get each other pregnant (though not at the same time), and women can also impregnate men just as easily as the reverse.
<size=18px><color=#5aa9d6>Compatibility</color></size> This mod is not compatible with the Intimacy mod.
________________________________________________
<size=18px><color=#5aa9d6>Updates</color></size> 11/27/2025: Fix bug with embryos forgetting one of their parents when reloading 06/17/2025: Update to 1.6, fix parent relation label in baby feeding tab 01/07/2025: Fixed bug that gave 100% fertility at all ages 01/01/2025: Added compatibility with existing saves, added pregnancy chance tweakvalue
<size=18px><color=#5aa9d6>Credits</color></size> • Mod icon: twitter.com/mouse_draws
